name: Fidget Spinner Toys
description:
Fidget Spinner Toys, An application for Stress Relieve.

Fidget Spinner Toys is an amazing application to relax a kid or an adult with its amazingly crafted fidgets and levels.

No more head banging, nail biting, finger twisting and expensive physical stress reliever but this cheap application. You will be given with 5 spins to set the tone of the game and advance in level with more fidgets to unlock. Key is to spin the fidget efficiently after each swipe so that you beat the levels set target. Once you advance in a level you will get more fidgets and you can tweak your fidgets with grease and apply some more tuning as you like. This is not all but you can set your fidget to earn offline as well.
Challenge for you is to unlock all the amazing fidgets and we believe that you can do it. There are lot of surprises hidden for you so buckle up and concentrate.
More fidgets coming soon so stay tuned, if you like the game then do not forget to comment.
Features Include.

1. Specially designed fidgets.
2. Tune your fidgets.
3. Earn Offline.
4. Compete with your friends.
